duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform QC reviews of various AML/BSA functions to determine adherence to quality standards and regulatory requirements.
Assist in assessing quality of case investigations and supporting quality control of investigative documentation.
Review SAR's submitted by BSA Investigators to ensure accuracy and completeness before filing with FinCEN.
Provide training, coaching, and mentoring to production teams based on case reviews results.
Develop and recommend methods to enhance quality and efficiency of QC/QA reviews.
Establish working relationships with key business partners across all lines of business.
Assist with monthly reporting, audit/exam requests, and first line of defense testing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Criminal Justice, or related studies. (Master's preferred)
